post:
Hello LET !

Prometeus decided to participate in this Black Friday event and also celebrate 16 years in business with a special combined coupon: 16years-bf  
This will grant you 16% off any IWStack items, be it new account or credits so both new or existing customers will benefit.  
Existing customers which do not wish to commit 25 Eur (discounted price), can order following this link:  https://www.prometeus.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=86 , but you will miss out on discounted credits.  
The promo will only last for 24 hours !
